data.eml:eml: Pseudolaguvia viriosa, a new catfish (Teleostei: Sisoridae) from north-eastern India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Heok Hee, Tamang, Lakpa (2012): Pseudolaguvia viriosa, a new catfish (Teleostei: Sisoridae) from north-eastern India. Zootaxa 3522: 81-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282684
